'''Luocheng''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears during [[Hu Tao]]'s first [[Story Quest]], [[Yet the Butterfly Flutters Away]].

He comes seeking [[Hu Tao]]'s help, for what he believes is a curse tormenting him.
